scripts.build: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` nuxt build
scripts.dev: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` nuxt dev
scripts.dev-win: $env:NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` $env:NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` $env:NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` nuxt dev
scripts.generate: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url`  nuxt generate
scripts.preview: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` nuxt preview
scripts.postinstall: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` nuxt prepare
